comments.body:
nit: The original code made skip if the node number is 0, and the changed code makes failure with `gomega.Expect(nodesInfo).NotTo(gomega.BeEmpty())` in GetReadySchedulableRandomNodeInfo().
I guess the new behavior is not bad because that is the same as the other test code.
This is just a comment if somebody face this new behavior.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +68,72 @@		pvc = nil
		pv = nil
		nodeInfo = GetReadySchedulableRandomNodeInfo()

		volLabel = labels.Set{e2epv.VolumeSelectorKey: ns}

comments.body: A little confused here, if we're removing the pv, pvc from the spec, why does this PR not have any added code which creates PV and PVC somewhere else? Or was it unused to begin with
Yeah, PVC/PV dependencies were removed in a different PR, but they didn't remove the variables from the arguments.
